name: Train Of Thought
description:
Train Of Thought
Ashley Alicea (@avashly) & Brianne Christiansen (@TheTurnipMiss)

This Train Jam 2016 game was inspired by Pixar's Inside Out and games like Snake / Centipede. In this local multiplayer, players compete to become the longest train of thought in a brain that's reaching maximum capacity. The first player to crash and derail the trains of thought loses the game.
